analysis.description:
P3DRaffle.validateraffle (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#202-235) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(100000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#233)
	- msg.sender.transfer(3000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#233-234)

Reentrancy in P3DRaffle.devfeetodev (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#185-189):
	External calls:
	- SPASM_.disburse.value(devfee)() (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#187)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- devfee (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#189)

P3DRaffle.buytickets (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#162-181) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-P3Dcontract_.buy.value(msg.value)(masternode) (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#179-181)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x6f9ef4d30498f23e7d3116e272b855597fba83bd.sol#61-63) is not in mixedCase
